version_description:
What's new:

— First bicycle event: Ambush
— French, German, and Spanish language packs
— New bicycle modifications: Hatchet and Shotgun
— Black Strider's armor and weapons
— New items: Undertakers' Acid Grenade and Mini Firefighter
— Content preview for traders' boxes

— French, German, and Spanish language packs

— New items: Undertakers' Acid Grenade and Mini Firefighter
— Content preview for traders' boxes

— The Upgrade Bench replaced with the Quick-fix Workbench. Weapons and armor repair is now available!
— New equipment: Tactical Belt. +1 belt quick slot.
— Ambush: Increased reward.
— Deals with traders are now limited.
— Bug fixes and improvements.

— New Undertakers' armor and weapons

— Festive masks and Shelter decorations

— Expanded Warehouse: a new wing and overhauled locations, along with equipment to complete it.
— The New Year event: compete with other players and receive unique prizes.
— Artifact-modified AKM, SVD, and Cryogun!
— A mini-event: Undertakers' Camp.
— New enemies: several types of ghouls, Armored Claw, Charred Beef, and new aberrations: Leechers!
— Klim's legendary armor.
— New Year costumes and Shelter decorations.

— Special event: Lunar New Year!
— New enemy gang: the Triad.
— New weapons: Rocket Launcher, Electrospear, and Triad Acid Automatic Crossbow.
— Lunar Armor sets: Lunar Warrior's set and Triad Dragon's set.
— Equipment that increases fire, acid, and electric damage.
— Festive masks and Shelter decorations.
— Shower and an extra locker in the Warehouse.
— Warehouse: improved performance.

— New aberrated zone: Old Gas Station! With new enemies and new allies
— New storyline quests from Klim
— Sequence of notes with Gas Station backstory
— 28 new daily rewards for logging in
— New item from Warehouse trader: Carnifex Killer's Legendary Box
— Warehouse Optimization

— The Institute Challenge: beat other players and earn prizes!
— New boss locations: Titan Project facilities.
— New legendary weapon to craft: SPAS-A Cobra, Glock-A Pyro, and Electromusket.
— New protection and equipment against acid and electric damage.
— Increased Warehouse reset interval: 16 to 24 hours.

— The Institute Challenge: beat other players and earn prizes!

— New legendary weapon to craft: SPAS-A Cobra, Glock-A Pyro, and Electromusket.
— New protection and equipment against acid and electric damage.
— Increased Warehouse reset interval: 16 to 24 hours.

— New event: Return of the Triad!
— 11 new legendary and uncommon weapons, dealing cold and electric damage.
— Icicle aberration, turrets, and new elite enemies in Triad Basements.
— Triad armor set bonus.
— New Shelter decorations and a Dragon mask.
— Artifact workbenches to produce gold and energy!
— New equipment, increasing cold damage.
— New trader in your Shelter: Hawker.

— New event: Return of the Triad!
— 11 new legendary and uncommon weapons, dealing cold and electric damage.
— Icicle aberration, turrets, and new elite enemies in Triad Basements.
— Triad armor set bonus.
— New Shelter decorations and a Dragon mask.
— Artifact workbenches to produce gold and energy!
— New equipment, increasing cold damage.
— New trader in your Shelter: Hawker.

— New event: Return of the Triad!

— Artifact workbenches to produce gold and energy!
— New equipment, increasing cold damage.
— New trader in your Shelter: Hawker.

— Introducing a new skill system in D.O.Z.! Master over 100 skills and boost your character.
— 11 new weapons, including a Two-Barreled Rifle and Mini-14.
— The new trader at the Institute Facilities: CHAP.
— Interact with CHAP at the Splinter trader's post to obtain the Facilities' coordinates.
— Use Tier 3 Lab Table to craft protection against Facilities' specimens.
— SVD-A Verdict and Spark Rifle can be crafted instead of Glock-A Pyro and Klim's Legendary armor.

— A new special event: Clean-up of the Territories!
— New weapons: M16 Liberty, Peacemaker revolver, AMT Hardballer Longslide pistol, and Hawks Barret M82 rifle.
— New Shelter decorations: Firework Cannon and Statue of Hope.
— An apple tree is now available for planting and harvesting in the Shelter.
— New food and appearance fragments.

— New Shelter decorations: Firework Cannon and Statue of Hope.
— An apple tree is now available for planting and harvesting in the Shelter.
— New food and appearance fragments.

— D.O.Z. Survival's first anniversary! A year ago the game was officially launched after the Early Access stage!
— A holiday event: kill enemies in the Territories and receive gifts from the new Anniversary Trader.
— New crafts: Surprise-3 Device, Anniversary Monument, and Strider Girl's Statue.
— Birthday Cake and Birthday Hat for a fun party!

— D.O.Z. Survival's first anniversary! A year ago the game was officially launched after the Early Access stage!
— A holiday event: kill enemies in the Territories and receive gifts from the new Anniversary Trader.
— New crafts: Surprise-3 Device, Anniversary Monument, and Strider Girl's Statue.
— Birthday Cake and Birthday Hat for a fun party!

— D.O.Z. Survival's first anniversary! A year ago the game was officially launched after the Early Access stage!
— A holiday event: kill enemies in the Territories and receive gifts from the new Anniversary Trader.
— New crafts: Surprise-3 Device, Anniversary Monument, and Strider Girl's Statue.
— Birthday Cake and Birthday Hat for a fun party!

— New event: the Rupture project! Destroy enemies and challenge other players.
— New location: the Dark Zone. Available to you from level 25.
— New enemies: Doppelgangers of other survivors. Claws and Charred Striders. New aberration: Echidna.
— 11 new types of Dark Zone weapons, Exterminator's armor set, throwing weapons with special effects to clean up the new zone.
— An opportunity to obtain the new items: the Dark Zone Explorer Lottery!

— 11 new types of Dark Zone weapons, Exterminator's armor set, throwing weapons with special effects to clean up the new zone.
— An opportunity to obtain the new items: the Dark Zone Explorer Lottery!

— New event: the Triad's Revenge! Open Triad Cargo and challenge other players!
— New artifact weapons of the Triad: Glock-A Cryo, Inferno Shotgun, Dragon's Tongue Spear, and Viper Bite Rifle.
— New Triad helmets and armor, along with the legendary Triad Shadow's armor set.
— The Wardrobe upgrade, which unlocks backpack skins.
— Upgrades to the existing Triad's decorations.

— Deadly locations featuring new storyline quests: the Collapsed Bridge and the Screaming Forest.
— New enemies: Forest Children faction and their incredibly hardcore boss: the Forest Beast.
— New armor sets of the Forest Beast and of the Forest Strider with new unique abilities.
— Legendary Forest Children's weapons and ghouls' bloody weapons.
— Another construction tier in your Shelter: new floors, walls, and workbenches.

— Halloween in the Territories! Earn points for killing pumpkin-headed Undertakers and compete with others.
— New festive locations: Pumpkin Heads' House and Serpent Brides' Camp.
— New Legendary Undertakers' weapons.
— New legendary armor: Lamia's Armored Coat and Helmet, and new effects on the old Serpent Cohort's Set.
— Festive decorations and an opportunity to complete the Undertakers' bicycle.

— New event: Decayers' Invasion! Clean up Crypts in the Territories and compete with other players!
— New Decay weapons, along with fire plus acid weapons!
— Decayers' legendary armor with new effects and a 15-slot backpack.

— The New Year event: kill the Charred with melee weapons and receive rewards.
— Challenge: kill more enemies with ranged weapons than other players.
— Institute's New Year Facility: Krampus!

— New Year decoration, costumes, and a backpack appearance.
— New in the Territories: a 20-slot backpack!

— The Warehouse is now 2.5 times bigger! Explore the Slammer and Carnifex's Lair.
— 100+ new storyline quests, notes, and dialogs!
— Assemble a motorbike!
— New enemies: Charred, ghouls, and aberrations with unique abilities.
— Bosses: Turnkey, the Prime Carnifex, and the Red Sphere!
— Symbiotic Turnkey's armor, ghoul weapon, and a flamethrower!
— Repair and use the drill to expand the Shelter Basement.
— New mechanics: lockpicks for cracking locks!

— The Steel Hawk Operation! An increased difficulty level unlocks for the seasoned Striders after the tenth completion.
— New weapons: AW Tactical rifle, Steyr AUG, Hawks MP5, and Desert Eagle!
— Unique Shelter decorations: Firework Cannon and the Statue of Hope.
— Hawks' food and unique appearance fragments.
— Fixed a number of glitches and improved performance

— Weekly faction missions! Complete the Free Brotherhood and Citadel Corps missions and receive rewards on a regular basis.
— Citadel Corps Outpost and new characters.
— Unique weapons, Shelter decorations, and Brotherhood and Citadel Corps backpack appearances.

— Golden status: free equipment, additional backpack functionality, gold and experience points bonuses.
— Motorbike modifications among Splinter's goods!

— Spring Festival in the Territories! Complete quests, find and identify eggs, and kill Hareheads.
— Finish the Fabergé Module, find festive masks and a new backpack appearance.
— Weapons with active abilities: Forest Guardian's Bow, Great Serpent's Soultaker, and AKM Volley.
— Special containers with increased capacity for storing raw planks and scrap metal.
— Several glitches fixed and performance improved.

— New aberrated zone: the Burned Restaurant, through which you will have to mark out a route!
— The Racketeers — a new faction with new quests.
— Enemies found in the Restaurant: the Flaming Charred and a brand-new boss — the Butcher!
— A new trader in the Burned Restaurant — the Dealer, who will trade common weapons for artifact ones!
— Nanites — a new type of gear that temporarily adds aberrated damage to your weapons.

— New event: Dark Zone Breach! Earn points by destroying aberrations and a new type of Charred. Spend these points to advance along three different Paths, each with unique rewards.
— Helpers: new characters with special abilities who will take refuge in the Shelter!
— New perfect weapons: the Bloodlust Rifle and Exterminators' Gatling Gun.
— Updated hunger and thirst mechanics: health loss has been replaced with a negative effect.
